title: scripters ruin more than the game
body: with the grading system that is running these guys are cheating us out of more than a fair game, they destroy the curve and make it harder to get a decent grade, reducing the chances of chests, keys and the s's required to level champs up beyond 5. please summoners, if your friend is running scripts get them to stop. you dont have to be a dick about it, just refuse to play with them, remind them that they arent platinum 3, the hacks they run are. that if they are running scripts they arent actually playing the game. that when someone you are playing with is hacking, you look like you are hacking too, this increases the chance of you being reported  and banned for something your friend has done. how would this sit with you? your "mate" getting your profile wiped because s/he is too selfish and lame to play right? its not just up to riot to fix this, we as a community need to come together to make this game fun again

replies.body: You get banned for playing with a scripter? My ban makes sense now. ;-;
if they have boosted you (which they can without your knowledge) you can get banned for boosting. so you know what i mean, that guy didnt just ruin your game. he ruined your day and your profile
